S:log-item.D:comment: Merged revision(s) 1420677 from lucene/dev/trunk: Hopefully fix the nightly Maven build: - The artifact creation never "installed" the artifacts in the local repository, so the validate task depended on downloading them -> which was wrong. - The jenkins-maven-nightly target now runs actually 2 builds: One that deploys to apache repo using ANT, installs locally and validates the artifacts with the locally installed versions; after that it runs the maven-based build with "mvn"
